mapper.select: SELECT JMNICKNAME, SPTITLE, SPADDR1, SPADDR2, EXTRAADDR, MEMSID, SPHSID, SPHSTART, SPHEND , SRSTART, SREND,SRWSID, STLESID, SPMAXPET, SPSID, GRADE, PRICE FROM SITTING_PLACE_LIST_VIEW
SELECT ISPT_SID AS ISPTSID, ISPT_NAME AS ISPTNAME FROM INDEX_SITTING_PLACE_TAG ORDER BY ISPT_SID
SELECT ISPTSID, ISPTNAME, SPSID FROM SITTING_PLACE_TAGS_VIEW
SELECT NVL(COUNT(SL_SID), 0) AS SLCOUNT FROM SITTING_LICENSE SL JOIN STS_CONDITION_VIEW SCV ON SL.STS_SID = SCV.STS_SID WHERE SCV.MEM_SID = #{memSid}
SELECT SBSID, SBSTARTYEAR, SBSTARTMONTH, SBSTARTDAY, SBEND, SBPRICE, PMEMSID FROM SITTING_BOOK_VIEW WHERE MEMSID = #{memSid}
SELECT JMNICKNAME, SPMAXPET, SPTITLE, SPCONTENT, SPADDR1, SPADDR2, EXTRAADDR, IPSID, SPSID FROM SITTING_PLACE_BASIC_VIEW WHERE MEMSID = #{memSid} ORDER BY SPCREATED DESC
SELECT JM_NICKNAME AS PJMNICKNAME, MEM_SID AS PMEMSID FROM JOIN_MEMBER

SELECT SPSID, ISPTNAME, ISPTSID FROM SITTING_PLACE_TAGS_VIEW WHERE SPSID IN (SELECT SPSID FROM SITTING_PLACE_TAGS_VIEW WHERE 1 =1
AND ISPTSID IN
#{isptSid}
GROUP BY SPSID)

SELECT SB.SB_SID AS SBSID, SB.SB_START AS SBSTART, SB.SB_END AS SBEND FROM SITTING_CANCEL SCL JOIN SITTING_BOOK SB ON SCL.SB_SID = SB.SB_SID JOIN SITTING_CREATE_CART SCC ON SB.SCC_SID = SCC.SCC_SID JOIN MEMBER MEM ON SCC.MEM_SID = MEM.MEM_SID JOIN JOIN_MEMBER JM ON MEM.MEM_SID = JM.MEM_SID WHERE SCL.SCL_DATE = SYSDATE AND JM.MEM_SID = #{memSid}
SELECT SRWSID, SRWTITLE, SRWCONTENT, SRWRATE, SRWDATE, MEMSID, PMEMSID, SBSID, SBSTART, SBEND FROM SITTING_REVIEW_VIEW WHERE SRWDATE = SYSDATE AND MEMSID = #{memSid}

SELECT SRR.SP_SID AS SPSID FROM SITTING_REPORT_COMPLETE SRC JOIN INDEX_MANAGER_ACTION IMA ON SRC.IMA_SID = IMA.IMA_SID JOIN SITTING_REPORT_RECEIVE SRR ON SRC.SRR_SID = SRR.SRR_SID WHERE IMA.IMA_SID = 4 AND SRC.SRC_DATE = SYSDATE AND SRR.SP_SID = ( SELECT SPH.SP_SID FROM SITTING_PLACE_HUB SPH JOIN SITTING_FOLLOWING_LIST SFL ON SPH.SPH_SID = SFL.SPH_SID JOIN MEMBER MEM ON SFL.MEM_SID = MEM.MEM_SID JOIN JOIN_MEMBER JM ON MEM.MEM_SID = JM.MEM_SID WHERE MEM.MEM_SID = #{memSid})

SELECT TO_CHAR(SB.SB_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SBSTART, TO_CHAR(SB.SB_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SBEND, MEM.MEM_SID AS PMEMSID, SB.SB_SID AS SBSID FROM SITTING_BOOK SB JOIN SITTING_CREATE_CART SCC ON SB.SCC_SID = SCC.SCC_SID JOIN MEMBER MEM ON SCC.MEM_SID = MEM.MEM_SID WHERE SB.SB_DATE = SYSDATE AND SCC.MEM_SID = #{memSid}

SELECT TO_CHAR(SB.SB_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SBSTART, TO_CHAR(SB.SB_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SBEND, MEM.MEM_SID AS MEMSID, SB.SB_SID AS SBSID FROM SITTING_BOOK SB JOIN SITTING_PLACE_HUB SPH ON SB.SPH_SID = SPH.SPH_SID JOIN SITTING_LICENSE SL ON SPH.SL_SID = SL.SL_SID JOIN SITTING_TEST_SUBMIT STS ON SL.STS_SID = STS.STS_SID JOIN SITTING_TEST_RECEIVE STR ON STS.STR_SID = STR.STR_SID JOIN MEMBER MEM ON STR.MEM_SID = MEM.MEM_SID WHERE SB.SB_DATE = SYSDATE AND MEM.MEM_SID = #{memSid}
